alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Desha; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 4:14PM CDT until June 27 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 414 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Tillar to near Ladelle to 8 miles northwest of Fountain Hill, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dermott... Tillar... McGehee... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... Jerome... Baxter... Johnsonville... Halley... Masonville... Collins... Valley... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Lacey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
